description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function 2.Elementary Logic 3.Relations 4.Counting 5.Graph and Tree 6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms 7.Digraphs

description.zh: 讓學生學習文獻之蒐集方法與整理，以便瞭解學術論文製作方式，培養學生獨立自主探討一個理論或技術上的問題，並經由實驗設計及資料之判讀更深入專業領域。
description.en: A course allows students collect and organize literature information and them design their own experiments. An independent research capability can be developed through out this learning process.

name.zh: 高分子材料與複合材料

description.zh: 授課內容包括高分子及複合材料的製程、結構及性質等綜合知識，首先介紹機械混練與接枝共聚合等基本製程方法，並探討交穿網狀高分子合膠材料，以及含浸顆粒狀、纖維狀、板狀等強化高分子複合材料的結構形態與工程性質之相關原理。
description.en: Synthesis, morphology and engineering behavior of polymer and composite materials. Mechanical blend alloys, block and graft copolymers, interpenetrating polymer networks, polymer impregnated particulate, fiber and sheet-reinforce polymeric composites are emphasized.

description.zh: 利用單元介紹的方式，將生物化學、微生物學、分子生物學、基因工程等原理，應用在微生物或蛋白質品種改良上，並介紹生物活性物質，如氨基酸、抗生素、免疫體、酵素、激素、特殊結構之蛋白、脂肪、醣類、脂肪酸、抗體等之製造方法。
description.en: Biotechnology applications in mutant microbial and protein productions are to be introduced based on the knowledge of biochemistry, microbiology, molecular biology, and genetic engineering, etc. This course also introduces the productions of some living blocks, such as amino acids, antibodies, enzymes, hormone, proteins, lipids, etc.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。包括Wavelet轉換、變分法及積分方程等工程分析之技術，且以Matlab軟體來應用至影像處理、噪音振動、最佳控制、偏微分方程等工程應用實例。.
description.en: Including Wavelet transform, Variation principle, and integral equation Engineering Analysis technology, try to use Matlab software apply to Image processing, denoise, optimal control, and solving partial differential equations.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機械手臂基礎理論，內容包含座標轉換、機械臂運動學、反運動學、動力學、軌跡規畫、機械臂設計、機械臂控制、機械臂的程式語言等。
description.en: It is a fundamental course concerning the theories of robotic manipulators. Topics contain frame transformations, manipulator kinematics, inverse kinematics, dynamics, trajectory planning, manipulator design, control of manipulators, robot programming languages.

description.zh: 本課程係提供本系同學消防設備與法規方面之基礎，以為將來投身防火工程時之重要技能，其課程內容包含:消防與建築法規、滅火設備、警報設備、避難逃生設備、消防搶救上之必要設備等。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the protection of fire engineering， It will cover: code of building and fire-fighting、outfire facilities、warning  message facilities 、refuge facilities and fire-fighting santch facilities etc.

name.en: Special Topics on Performance Design for Evacuation

description.zh: 1.建築與安全2.防災計畫與內容3.避難計畫4.煙控計畫5.性能式避難安全設計6.實例研討
description.en: 1.Architecture & Safety2.Contents of Disaster Prevention Plan3.Planning for Evacuation & Egress Routes4.Planning for Smoke Control5.Performance-based Designing for Evacuation Safety6.Case Study

description.zh: 本課程係提供防火工程有關基礎概論、設計工學手法及實務技術等理論與應用兼重的課程，以促進學生自立研討學習能力，提高教學良性互動關係，可供職場工程實務相關防火工程之重要技能與知識。內容包括：一、現行防火安全法規與性能式防火法規二、性能式防火設計基礎概論三、防止起火及火災成長有關技術四、火災探測與滅火有關技術五、控制室內外延燒擴大有關技術六、避難疏散與逃生有關技術七、煙氣控制有關技術八、構造耐火設計有關技術
description.en: The purpose of course is to provide the fundamental theory and practical technique about the fire protection engineering, encourage the establishment of self-learning ability of students and facilitate their skill and knowledge about fire protection engineering in construction job. The course covers the following subjects:1.fire safety related regulation and performance-based code in force2.fundamental theory for performance-based design3.prevention techniques about fire initiation and growth4.techniques of fire detection and extinguishment5.control techniques about interior and exterior flame-spread6.means of evacuation and escape7.techniques of smoke control8.techniques about fire resistance design of structure

description.zh: 岩石工程是一門應用的課程，它的重點在於把基本的岩石力學的原理，運用在實際的工程問題上，因此，這門課將介紹岩石力學在岩石邊坡、岩石基礎、及岩石隧道上的應用。上課的學生在完成這門課之後，應該對這三大類的問題都有清楚的了解。為了使沒有上過岩石力學的學生也能進入狀況，這門課會先對岩體分類法（如RMR法及Q法）及立體投影圖加以回顧，然後再進行岩石邊坡工程、岩石基礎工程、及岩石隧道工程的介紹。「岩石工程」的課程大綱如下：
description.en: The focus of this course is the application of the basic principles of rock mechanics.  Three types of applications are to be covered in this semester-long course: rock slopes, rock foundations, and rock tunnels.  The students are expected to complete assignments in each of the above three categories.  To prepare students with no previous academic work in rock mechanics, this course will review the classification systems of rock masses (such as the RMR and the Q systems).  Also, the stereographic projection is a required tool, which will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the IE related journals.  The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: This course includes the subjects of making a computer system, which has the capability of solving problems intelligently, storaging knowledge reasoning, recognition, vision, representation, learning, perception, and analyzing problems.

description.zh: 介紹全面品管的意義、理念、重要性、範圍、實施條件、方法、工具，及管理手法，同時介紹如何克服實施中所遭遇的問題，及其預期成效
description.en: This course introduces the meaning, theory, importance, scope, implementing contraints, approaches, tools and management methods of TQM.  Besides, it also discusses how to overcome the problems during implementation and the expected effectiveness.

description.zh: 介紹生產製造之影響因素，講授切削力學、工程材料、材料成型、塑性加工、粉末冶金…等等生產技術，然後探討高精密加工技術、半導體製造技術以及高速製造法。
description.en: Review of basic aspects of manufacturing engineering including driving forces, quality attributes, mechanical behavior, tolerances, etc. Examination of basic principles of mechanics, engineering materials, analysis of casting, bulk forming, sheet forming processes, plastics processing, powder processing, metal cutting, ultraprecision machining, high-speed machining and other related manufacturing

description.zh: 這門課敘述服務在經濟的角色、服務觀念和競爭策略，服務業的結構、服務的管理、世界級的服務和服務應用的量記模式。
description.en: This course describes the role of services in an economy . The service concept and competitive strategy , the structure of the service enterprise , the management of service operations , world-class service and quantitative models with service applications .

description.zh: 本課程擬對排與排程方法的理論基礎做一教導，並以排程相關論文做研討‧
description.en: This course will focus on the theory of basic sequencing and scheduling methods.Journal articles will be discussed in the class.

description.zh: 企業經營體制個案診斷，以診斷方式、技術、步驟及書面、口頭報告應如何撰寫。
description.en: This topic focus on the case study which based on diagnostic method, technique, skill, procedure, and reporting and presenting skill..

description.zh: 學習整體生產系統包括:設計資料、製造資訊、CAD/CAM及其它製造單元之整合，如何在效率與成本因素下安排製造法，以較快速與較低成本生產出高品質之產品，本課程亦將針對產品需求預測、生產計劃、品質控制、材料等管理問題深入探討。
description.en: Examination of the basic elements that are used to integrate the design and manufacture of capital and consumer products, manufacturing information systems, CAD/CAM systems, and manufacturability considerations when integrating unit process operations. How to plan and execute efficient and cost-effective manufacturing operations that produce high quality, and economical product. Study the demand forecasting, inventory planning, production scheduling, quality control, MRP, and project control.

description.zh: 本課程在探討服務系統傳遞作業之設計，服務業的經營管理原則，透過個案研究，發展出一套解決問題之技術。
description.en: Objectives of this course are (1)to learn the principles which guide the design and operation of service delivery system，(2)to study applications of these principles to many service firms，(3)to develop problem solving skills through cases and problem sets .

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程讓學生了解車輛省油不單純只是引擎燃燒性能或機構的改良而已，且另一個對車輛省油有重要貢獻的手段便是車輛的傳動系統技術的改良，此先進改良的方式增加學生對傳動系統重要性的認識。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of power train system, the relationship between engine and power train system, and the mechanical design of power train system. The purpose of this study is to increase the students' understanding in power train system.

description.zh: 引擎及主要控制系統介紹，引擎動力系統之數學模式（含進氣系統、油路系統、點火系統、廢氣排放系統），閉迴路空燃比控制，爆震控制，引擎怠速之控制，引擎等速之控制，引擎加速／減速調整。
description.en: Introduction of Engine and Main Control System, Mathematical Model of Engine Dynamic System (Including Inlet System, Oil-Loop System, Ignition System, Exhaust System), Closed-Loop Air-Fuel Ratio Control, Detonation Control, Engine Idle Speed Control, Engine Cruising Speed Control, Engine Acceleration/Deceleration Regulation.

name.en: Special Topics on Internal Combustion Engines

description.zh: 進、排氣系統與空氣動力學，排放物與燃燒現象，循環模擬與分析，引擎性能調諧及控制，引擎噪音源與控制。
description.en: Gas Dynamics in Intake and Exhaust Manifold, Emissions and Related Combustion Phenomena, Cycle-Simulation and Analysis, Engine Performance Tuning and Control, Engine Noise Source and Its Control.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 自動化應用基礎，自動化規劃設計︰1. 個體冷凍設備2. 冷凍系統運轉操作3. 冷凍倉儲管理自動化4. 低溫冷凍應用自動化
description.en: Fundamentals and design of automation applications include:1. Unitary refrigeration equipment.2. Refrigerating system operation.3. Refrigerated warehousing management.4. Low temperature refrigeration application.

description.zh: 超低溫冷凍通常指進行在-100℃以下特定低溫範圍之冷凍技術應用，譬如高能能物理同步輻射冷卻，生物醫學胚胎冷凍保存，大型超低溫冷能氣化發電廠與中、長程飛彈推進系統冷卻技術等，現代微系統科技多方面高層次應用上之必要技術。故如何進行實質而有效整合超低溫系統技術，是決定未來國力競爭之主要關鍵項目。本課程主要內容將涵蓋：1. 多段多元化自動冷卻系統技術。2. .超低溫循環冷媒特性。3. 生物基因晶化冷凍技術應用。4. 系統裝置之材料選擇。5. 電子微觀系統應用。6. 超低溫冷卻劑之檢測與分析。
description.en: At the completion will have learned of this course:1. Multiple stage and cascade refrigeration systems technology.2. Refrigerant characteristics for low-temperature cycle.3. Biomedical applications of cryogenic refrigeration.4. Choice of low-temperature materials for refrigeration systems.5. Research applications of electron microscopy.6. Refrigerant properties of super low-temperature coolants.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹化學儲能裝置和儲冷系統之基礎與實務。課程內容包括：(一)儲能裝置理論與技術：電池儲能系統與模組、轉換器，各式燃料電池，如燐酸電池，質子交換電池等。(二)儲冷系統理論與技術：儲冰水式系統，各式儲冰系統如全凍結式、冰盤管式、冰泥式、動態製冰式、優態鹽及冰球式等。
description.en: This course including two parts:electrochemical energy storage/conversion theory and technology, and thermal storage system fundamental and technology:Electric cell engergy conversion system and module, transformer and fuel cells such as phosphatic cell and proton-exchanging chilled water systemand ice storage systems such as total freeze-up, ice-on-coil,ice slurry, dynamic ice builder, eutectic salt and ice ball systechnology will also be covered.  The advanced PCM for thermal storage will be investigated as a hint to the students.

description.zh: 系統功能分析，空調系統設計概要，負荷計算理論，送風與風管系統分析，送水系統分析，冷卻水塔熱質傳分析，主機系統性能分析
description.en: System function analysis, introduction to system designs of air-conditioning, theories on cooling load calculation, air moving and duct system analysis, water system analysis, heat and mass transfer in cooling towers, performance analysis of chillers

description.zh: 空調中央監控系統之規劃設計。課程內容含設備運轉之操作管理，配合電力尖峰負載控制節電管理，能源有效利用控制，溫度、濕度、環境因子之監測及操控，故障監測維修控制等，並介紹空調系統運轉最佳化之方法。
description.en: This course is focused on the design and planning of central monitoring system for HVAC controls. The contents are the operating management of equipment, effective energy usage, temperature/humidity/environmental factors monitoring and control. The optimal methods applied in the operation of HVAC are also included.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: Group Discussion.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming、network analysis、dynamic programming、game theory、(non)Integer linear programming、markov chains (markovian decision process)、queueing theory、inventory models、forecasting models、decision analysis and system simulation

description.zh: 本課程旨在針對流通業中各項經營管理項目作探討，其中包含設施位置選定，人力資源，流通規劃，及銷售促進等。此外，商用地理資訊系統之應用及個案研討亦包含在此課程中。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the required management issues of retail business，such as location selection，human resource ，retail planning ，and marketing etc。Besides，at also includes business GIS and case study。

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論、論文討論
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers.The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study、Paper  discuss

description.zh: 本課程包含資料庫行銷之基本內容及未來發展，聯合資料庫，供應目標對象，可預測模組及決策支援等。
description.en: This course includes the fundamental theory of database marketing and its future development, consolidated database, offer targetting, predictive modeling and decision support.

description.zh: 使電腦系統具有解決問題的能力、智慧的表現及儲存的型態、理解及辨識的能力、及視覺、聽覺、觸覺及表達的能力、並有學習、認知、分析理解等能力。
description.en: Made computer the power of problem solving, intelligent behavior and storage type, comprehension and distinguish abilities. The abilities of vision, hearing, touching, learning, identifying, analyzing are also the target of the course.

description.zh: 本課程包含：企業環境變化，組織改造之時機及企業內部之因應，企業流程再造之案例及流程實習。
description.en: This course includes: the change of business environment, the timing and process of organizational reengineering, the response and solution of organization during reengineering, the case study and practice.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為沿續教育統計學（一）課程，探討教育問題進階研究，所需之統計理論與方法。課程內容含卡方檢定法、多因子變異數分析、趨向分析、共變數分析、因素分析及無母數統計考驗等。
description.en: This course focuses on application of statistical principles and methods. Course contains include Chi-square techniques, multivariate analysis of variance, trend analysis, covariance analysis, factor analysis and nonparametric tests.

description.zh: 研究虛擬學習系統組成要素的發展背景、現況與未來，並探就不同生涯階段的學習者，運用虛擬學習系統的成功學習策略。
description.en: In-depth study of the fields of virtual learning. Topics include the components of virtual learning systems, development background, current status and perspective of virtual learning. Exploration of successful strategies for learners' using virtual learning systems in different career stages.

description.zh: 教學心理的特質、範圍與研究方法；認知學派、行為學派及其他相關學派；教學領域的探索，教學效果影響變項的探索；教學心理學的應用及未來發展趨勢。
description.en: Examination of peculiarity, scope, theories, and research methodology on instructive psychology. Topics include behavioral approaches to instructive, cognitive approaches to instruction, and other related instructive theories, types of instruction, variables that affect instruction, and applications of instruction theories.

description.zh: (1) 探討比較技職教育的意義、發展與研究方法。(2) 介紹主要國家的技職教育制度。(3) 從事比較技職教育問題的分析。
description.en: (1) Examination of concepts, development and research methodology of comparative technical-vocational education.(2) Knowledge in comparison technical-vocational education in Chinese in terms of purpose system and problems with those of selected foreign countries.(3) Analysis of major research regarding contemporary trends and issues in comparative technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Strategies of Instruction in Technical-Vocational

description.zh: 探討技職教學策略理論，並以課程分析、學校需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教學目標、教學內涵。並進行教學評鑑。
description.en: Trends in methodology for designing, and evaluating instruction in technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 技職教育課程設計研究

description.zh: 探討課程設計理論並以職業分析、社會需求等因素為基礎，決定技職教育課程目標、課程內涵，並進行課程評鑑。
description.en: Exploration of theories of curriculum design as well as objectives, contents and planning of curriculum in technical- vocational education that meet society needs and career analysis. Critical Analysis and evaluation of curriculum in technical-vocational education.

name.en: Studies in Evaluation of School in Tecgbucal

description.zh: 探討技職學校評鑑理論，並以學校本位與需求為基礎，決定技職學校教育目標、辦學內涵。並進行學校評鑑。
description.en: Trfends in methodology for designing, and evaluating schoolin technical-vocational education at vocational high school and community college levels.

name.zh: 當代技職教育思想研究
name.en: Study of Contemporary Technical-Vocational Education Thought

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對當前技職教育思想重要課題，並挑選有興趣之子題提出心得報告。
description.en: Exploration of concepts and current issues underlying from major research on contemporary technical-vocational education thought. Discussion and selected topics research are required.

name.en: Administrative Management & Decision Making in Technical

description.zh: 研究生探討主題可針對技職行政組織、管理模式與決策原則進行個案探討。
description.en: Exploration of research in administrative organization, management models and principles of decision making in technical-vocation education. Case study, group discussion and reporting are required.

name.en: Study of Leadership in Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 本課程目標在研究技職學校領導原理與實務，課程內容包含課題討論、小組討論與個案研究。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to study the principles and practices of leadership in technical-vocational education. Case study, group meeting, and selected topics research are required.

description.zh: 以系統方略思考組織成長的動態歷程，研究組織內學習行為的變遷；包含個人、小團體，乃至群體間之智能之成長。
description.en: To study dynamic process of organization development by system approach thinking focusing on changing of learning behavior, including multi intelligent development of individual, small team, and group members.

description.zh: （一）認識人力資源發展策略之理論知識；（二）培養人力資源發展策略的能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展與組織策略之關係、人力資源發展實務模式分析、員工訓練發展之方法、組織發展策略、高階管理人員發展、跨文化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、企業參觀及個案研究等方法實施之。
description.en: An in-depth examination of planning, theories, and implementation in strategies of human resource management. Topics include staffing, development, appraisal, and rewards. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and case study.

description.zh: 研討內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探討、生涯決定因素、生涯技巧、生涯角色調適、生涯選擇與規劃技巧、生涯訪談、生涯高原調適、性別和職業歧視、雙生涯家庭、就業準備等主要生涯的研究與實作。
description.en: In-depth study of research in career development & guidance. Topics include an introduction to career idea, the exploration of interest, personality, and view of value, decision making of career, techniques of career development, adjustment of career role, choice and planning of career, interview, adjustment of career highness, adjustment of changing role, discrimination of gender and job, a family of two career parents, job preparation.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式就其興趣對技職教育課程的設計領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in curriculum and instruction. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--教育發展策略

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育教學發展策略，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in education development strategy. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research in education development strategy and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生透過個別化的學習方式，就其興趣對技職教育校園環境，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作，以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of current issues, theories, and research in campus settings. An individualized study program is planned for graduate students to develop the skills and research and guided by a professor.

name.zh: 獨立研究--學校公共關係

description.zh: 研究生提出學校公共關係有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study program is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in school public relations. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in school public relation. Outcomes include the writing of research.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討各種高分子之聚合方法及動力學之研究，如逐步聚合、遊離基連鎖聚合、乳化聚合、離子連鎖聚合、連鎖共聚合反應、開環聚合、立體規則高分子之合成，未終止的游離基聚合方法。從分子量的分佈，結構物性之關係，作高分子聚合之最佳化設計，並且探討這些聚合方法如何應用在最新的科技上，如光電材料、複合材料。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the polymer synthesis and Kinetics studies. The synthesis includes step polymerization, free radical chain polymerization, emulsion polymerization, ionic chain polymerization, chain copolymerization, ring opening polymerization, sterospecific polymerization and living free radical polymerization. The synthesis scheme is optimized with the structure-properties relationship and molecular design. The potential application of these methods in high-tech materials, such as optoelectronics, and composites, will be elucidated.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括：(I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。(II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形  等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units :(I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of  Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending.(II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane      Formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子用於光電工業的原理及方法。主要分為�電子構裝高分子?電路成像高分子?光電子成像材料?最近的光電新材料。包括用於光碟、電變色、非線性光學、LB薄膜、發光二極體材料，導電及半導電高分子。本課程探討這些材料的合成方法，應用原理以及對未來的展望，作詳細的探討。
description.en: This course is to elucidate the synthesis and application of polymer in optoelectronics.It includes�polymer for electron package?polymer for photoresist?polymer for photoimaging?The advanced material of optics disc, electronic chromic, nonlinear optics, LB film, organic photodiode,and conducting polymer.The synthetic scheme of these material and their application will be fully discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討如何結合硬體建設與柔性需求的社區規劃，以創造理性生活空間。並從都市規劃設計、公共安全、社區結構過程與社區組織等不同層面聯繫建築與都市設計議題，探討社區發展問題與對策。課程內容主要包括：1.社區定義、相關理論、形成、類型、環境問題及改善策略。2.社區建設與發展之規劃主題。3.社區鄰里單元規劃、土地細分與計畫整合單元開發、國民住宅社區  規劃。4.社區管理與維護。5.社區規劃/社區營造與民眾參與。6.社區規劃與社區文化、生活品質及防災。7.社區規劃實務：實例探討。
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the way of community planning is          concerned with achieving a between physical creativity and well-being of   the community and to explore the development issues and strategies to cope with. Thus the course including : 8.Definitions, theories, genesis and morphology of the community.9.Issues and strategies of community development and planning.10.Neighborhood nuit planning land subdivision and unit development planning and public housing community planning ..etc11.Management and maintenance of community.12.Community planning development and public participation.13.Community planning and culture living quality as well as public safety.14.Community planning practice.

description.zh: 本課程主要為討論台灣地區建築上的風土特色，以及本地各歷史階段之建築回應此特質所提供的建築成就或特色。
description.en: This course explores the vernacular character of Taiwanese architecture and architectural achievement and characteristics in response to the character during respective historical periods.

description.zh: 進階的軟、硬體應用與技術的介紹。課程內容主要集中於設計理論的思考過程與現有最新的電腦輔助設計等相關軟硬體間的密切關係; 例如, 如何利用適當的現有最新設備技術之結合並運用於設計過程的創造和表現。
description.en: Advanced media techniques.  It is organized in two related areas: Computer Aided Design and Design Theory.  Computer Aided Design focuses on the use and development of computational tools in the service of design.  Design Theory focuses on the conceptual and formal ideas associated with computation and deals with their application and development.  Students also utilize computer aided sequence manipulation and image compositing tools in the production of multimedium-multilayered video.

description.zh: 本課程主要在探討台灣地區從日據時期至民國八十年代都市規劃範型的演變，內容包括各歷史階段中的經濟、社會及政治背景的主要特徵，以及對應在都市規劃作業上的實際狀況。並藉由案例分析，使學生更深入認識都市規劃的本質及其背後各種支配力量和限制因素。
description.en: The course mainly explores the urban planning history during last one hundred years in Taiwan. The changing paradigms and the social, economic, and political contexts of each time period are discussed.In addition, many planning cases are analyzed to obtain the better ideas of what the characteristics of urban planning, the dominated powers behind, and the limitations are.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.。

description.zh: 21世紀的工業設計師已不能再靜待市場研究及產品企劃人員提供產品設計規範，而應以使用者代言人、及企業產品開發整合者身分，主動參與產品策略與企劃，並以視覺化技術協助相關人員作橫向溝通。因此，「產品創新設計策略與企劃」課程主要目標在教導學生以「前瞻性的視野」，透過創新設計的步驟與方法，策劃出符合企業技術及經營體質，並且能滿足市場及使用者使用情況需求的產品。本課程將以理論、方法、案例研討及個案研究方式進行。
description.en: The function of industrial design in the 21st  century, will no longer waiting for the product definition from the marketing and product planning, It will become a integrator and visualizer during the product innovation strategic phase, and concerning to the user's needs.          	Product Innovation Strategy will guide the enterprise looking beyond their current operation to match their technologies and the distinct competencies with emerging the user and the market needs.The contents of this topic will include theory, methodology, and practical case study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討調查研究法與統計學之理論基礎，課程著重其在工業設計領域內的實際運用情形。
description.en: This course is designed to study the theoretical foundation of survey and statistical reasoning that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. The course focuses on its' application in Industrial Design field.

name.zh: 公共戶外家具設計研究

description.zh: 藉由戶外家具案例之分析探討公共環境與人類行為間之關係及公共戶外家具之材料、造形、人機介面、維護與安全等因素，並經由討論形成公共戶外家具之設計思維。
description.en: Case studies on outdoors furniture design to examine the relationship between open space environment and human behavior. The design factors of material, form, ergonomics, maintenance and safety will be studied. Design philosophy of outdoors furniture is to be deliberating in the discussions.

description.zh: 因應國際分工、快速研發的需求，本課程以研究設計團隊如何有效地運用同步及非同步溝通技術，執行設計專案，並探討遠距設計的問題、可行的設計模式，以及培養電腦仲介與管理的技能。
description.en: This course is designed to study how to effectively employ both synchronous and asynchronous communication technologies to carry out a project designing at a distance in order to shorten cycle times. It is also to investigate the problems with the communication media and potential of this way of working. Finally the course provides the discipline of computer mediation and management for distributed groups.

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程依此宗旨討論土壤管理、有害物質處理與處置、水及廢水處理與管理；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are soil management, hazardous waste treatment and disposal and water and wastewater treatment and management. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

description.zh: 1. 電力科技之改革2. 世界各國電力自由化發展3. 電力交換組織架構4. 獨立系統操作組織架構5. 電力庫制度6. 損失計算7. 電價計算
description.en: 1. Revolutions of power Technologies2. The development of deregulation in the world3. Organization of power exchange4. Organization of independent system operator5. power pool6. Power wheeling7. Calculations of losses8. Calculations of electric prices

description.zh: 1. 可程式控制器(PLC)概論2. PLC指令說明與應用3. PLC I/O介面4. A/D、D/A介面5. PLC與電腦連線6. 分散式控制系統7. 中小型PLC網路系統8. PLC選用9. PLC網路監控系統10. PLC應用實習5~7個
description.en: 1. Introduction to PLC (Programmable Logic Controller)2. PLC Instructions and Applications3. PLC I/O Interfaces4. A/D and D/A Interfaces5. PLC and PC Communications6. Distributed Control System7. PLC Network8. PLC Selection9. Monitor Control System10. Laboratory work: 5~7 experiments

description.zh: 機率空間；組合分析；隨機變數；期望值與慣矩；聯合分佈隨機變數；慣矩母函數及特徵函數；大數法則及中央極限定理；隨機漫步及帕森程序。
description.en: Course Title:Probability and StatisticsDescription:This course is designed for students to get concepts andmethods of Probability and Statistics. The main purpose of this courseis establishment of the foundations of industrial management, qualitycontrol, and industrial economics.

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 由於世界各國對自來水水質標準逐漸提高，因此，自來水高級處理已變成目前國際上飲用水研究之主要趨勢。此外在台灣，由於河川受污水下水道普及率低及工業污染之影響下，原水水質長久不佳。傳統處理程序已無法因應消費者之需求，高雄水質不佳即是最好例子。因此，本課程之重點嘉集中高級自來水之處理程序，如薄膜逆滲透、超過濾、為過濾、臭氧等高級氧化程序與有機物吸附等處理程序。
description.en: Because of the tightened regulation enacted by many countries, advanced drinking water treatment technology has been the research focus all around the world. In addition, in Taiwan, water resource, including surface and ground water, are seriously polluted due to industrial discharge and low sewerage system connection ratio. Traditional treatment processes, such as coagulation, sedimentation, filtration, are not enough for water purification for these deterioraated raw water gualities. Therefoore, this class will offer the opportunity to improve the knowledge for advanced drinking water treatment technology, including reverse osmosis, nanofiltration, ozone disinfection, GAC adsorption, and me.

name.en: Non-eelctric Power Air Cond. Energy saving Tech.

description.zh: 非電力空調節能技術在與傳統利用機械壓縮式系統比較下，具有實質提供冷熱與電力的低成本、高效率之最佳經濟上特性。本課程內容將涵蓋： 1.吸收式系統技術 2.各式燃料電池﹝Fuel Cell﹞的連結應用技術 3.氫氣引擎的應用 4.MHD-磁動力流體發電技術 5.各種非電力空調技術評估 6.系統的最適化設計

description.en: Refrigeration design, structure design, insulation and vapor barrier design, heat load calculation, temperature and humidity control, defrost design and control, airflow design, performance analysis

description.zh: 本課程在闡述化學工業中以環保出發的催化劑之原理與應用。內容包括催化劑之化學結構、反應性、製備、物性鑑定、反應動力學分析。由催化循環、反應機制、催化劑結構、動力學來說明催化反應之原理。除此，並著重於介紹各催化反應應用類型：催化反應在溶液中、酵素、沸石孔洞及重要之工業固相觸媒。
description.en: This course explores the principles and applications of catalysts for the environmentally benign chemical processes. Topics include the concepts in chemical structure and reactivity of catalyst, catalyst preparation, catalyst characterization, and micro kinetic analysis of catalytic processes. The principles are illustrated with catalytic cycles, reaction mechanisms, catalyst structures, and kinetics. Additionally, we emphasis on applications of catalysis in solution, enzymes, solid and surfaces, within the molecular-scale cages of zeolites and sieves, the most important industrial catalysts.

description.zh: 本課程講解有關生產設備投資低，雖量少，但附加價值高之精細化學品，如各種界面活性劑，添加劑，促進劑，催化劑，助劑，香料，顏料，醫藥等。並引例介紹這些化學品製程，用途，運用原理，國內外特用化學品之現況與發展。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicinals, etc.  Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discusses in this course.

description.zh: 介紹防止環境污染相關之防止技術。依氣體、液體、固體、噪音、輻射等各種不同污染源﹐分別探討解決空氣、水質、土壤、噪音以及熱污染之防治方法。內容包括環境工程有關之單元操作及設計﹐並對生物反應氣之組合、操作及用途加以介紹。
description.en: This course introduces the technology of environmemtal pollution prevention. It investigates the way to control air, water, soil, noise and thermal pollutions according to various gas, liquid, solid, noise and radioactive pollution sources. The content of this course involves the unit operation and design for environmental engineering concerned equipments. It also introduce the combination of bioreactors, operation and use of these reactors for the application to environmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程綜合介紹電化學之原理，電化學程序和反應器之輸送理論、操作和設計，並介紹相關之電化學工業。
description.en: This course involves three parts: the comprehensive introduction to principles of electrochemistry,the transport theory, design and operation of electrochemical processes and reactors, and the related electrochemical industries.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生瞭解各類化工程序模式的建立以及其求解的方法。內容包括：輸送動態方程式之建立，線性、非線性、矩陣、微分方程等之轉換及求解。
description.en: The goal of process simulation is to develop numerical analysis techniques that allow students to simulate the behavior of a chemical process. The contents involving：the development of dynamic equations of transport, the transformations and solutions of linear, nonlinear matrix, and differential equations.

name.zh: 建築施工災害與應變措施
name.en: Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures

description.zh: 基礎開挖施工作業的災害最主要的是擋土牆的傾倒,這是源自於隆起、砂湧及管湧的現象。開挖區的土壤為砂土,如果擋土牆漏水,由於淘空所形成的管湧,會導致鄰房的損壞;由於擋土牆貫入深度的不足以及點井措施的不良,會造成開挖區的砂源,最終導致擋土牆的傾倒。開挖區的土壤如果為粘土,而且粘土含水量大於液限,則開挖區的粘土產生塑性液,使支撐系統挫屈破壞,最後造成擋土牆的破壞。這些原理皆為課程的內容。此外,當基礎施工災害的機制了解之後,再講授如果發現災害的徵兆,如何採取必要的緊急應變措施, 使災害消失於無形,這些應變措施分別按照技術及行政層面來敘述。
description.en: 英文名稱:Foundution Construction Disaster and Remedial Measures  The hazand during foundation excavation is retaining wall failure, this may be caused by heaving、boiling and piping。If excavation is conducted in granular soil in which retaining wall is found leaking, the migration of silty soil will trigger piping and eventually wall failure。 If excave embedded depth of retaining wall and point walls are insufficient, this can cause boiling and lead to wall failure。 If encavation is in cohesive soil and water content is higher than liquid limit, plastic flow will lead to huckling of bracing system and to the wall failure。 After the various failure mechanisms are explained, how to identify the symptoms and how to take urgent remedial measures both technology and administration are explained accordingly。

description.zh: 本課程係探討非織物、針織物、梭織物、地工格網、地工格框、地工薄膜與複合地工織物在土木工程上之應用。其內容包括各種地工織物之背景、製造原理與方法、測試方法與原理及其適用終端應用領域。最後將討論上述各種不同地工織物之元件與機械性質之差異。
description.en: The course is to interpret the applications of the nonwoven, knitted fabric, woven fabric, geonet, geogrid, geomembrane, and composite geotextiles in civil engineering.   It includes background, fabrication methods and principles, measuring methods and theory, and their suitable end application fields.　 Finally the difference in mechanical properties and geotextile assembly will be discussed.

description.zh: 本課程主要使學生明瞭各種功能性纖維的合成原理及加工條件，主要的功能性纖維有下述幾種：1.高強力纖維，聚乙烯纖維膠泥紡絲，碳纖維合成原理。2.液晶系列纖維，克維拉纖維，以分子級複合材料觀念合成高性能纖維。3.芳香族纖維，PBI纖維，僵硬苯環合成耐高溫、高模數纖維。4.光學纖維、光電通信用的纖維。5.陶瓷纖維、耐酸鹼及耐高溫結構性纖維。6.抗菌、防臭纖維。7.易溼、快乾、中空纖維。8.感溫、感光纖維。9.超細纖維。10.非織物。 11.聚醯氨防火纖維。12.導電高分子纖維。

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。

description.zh: 粉末冶金是工業先進國家積極發展的重點科技之一，其內容涵蓋粉末製造、粉末成形固結以及燒結體的後處理等範圍，本課程即安排包括粉末製造、粉末特性與其測定、粉末混合與造粒、成形、燒結理論與實務、燒結體性質與其測定、燒結體的後處理等基礎項目。另外，再講述利用粉末冶金技術製造的材料與產品的實務應用項目等，以期讓學生能對粉末冶金技術能有基本上的認識。
description.en: Powder metallurgy is one of the most important highlighted high-tech in the developed countries, its content includes powder making,powder formation and condensing,and the final treatment of sintered body,etc.Thus, this course includes the fundamental items such as powder manufacturing, powder characteristics and its test, powder mixing and granulation, formation, sintering theory and practice, the property of sintering body and its test, the post-treatment of sintering body. Besides, it also lectures practice method like using powder metallurgy to manufacture material and product, in order to let students have basic knowledge about powder metallurgy.

description.zh: 如何將材料創造出強度更高，延伸率，斷面收縮率，衝整值等耐強度更大之材料，除了調整合金元素外，如何應用熱處理之手段使材料達到所求之特性。對於各種熱處理之原理、解析及實際的應用作詳盡的介紹。隨著科技之發達，機械工業之進步、構造物之增大及精密化、迷你化之趨勢，金屬材料所要求之性質需要更進一步之強化，為滿足此一要求，除調整合金元素之外，必須賴適當的熱處理，才能發揮材料本身含有合金元素之功能，亦可滿足吾人所需之各種用途，本課程為使學生瞭解這些處理方法，由理論上說明熱處理與變態理論，及熱處理對強化機構上之理論根據，及熱處理之方法等，本熱處理課程內容有：1.金屬熱處理之基礎，各種組織與變態，平衡圖在熱處理上之應用，連續冷卻，恆溫冷卻，在熱處理之應用、鋼之淬火變態舉動，合金元素在材料上之影響，結晶粒之大小性質對熱處理之影響，鋼之硬化能之應用及計算方法。2.熱處理技術、鋼之加熱及各種熱處理方法。3.鋼之光輝熱處理，保護爐氣之種類及其管理方法。4.鋼之表面硬化熱處理。5.淬火零件之設計及材料之選擇。6.工具模具鋼、不銹鋼、鑄鐵、銅及鋁合金之熱處理。7.熱處理發生不良原因及其防止方法。

The surface structure and component change are analyzed by SEM, ESCA and contact angle instruments to investigate the modification on polymer surface.

description.zh: 本課程授課主要分成六項：（1）從都市歷史發展，討論過去、現在與未來；（2）以永續都市發展理論，探討都市型態及設計理論；（3）以都市空間的構成探討解讀、架構及產生的理論；（4）以都市空間的形成探討社會過程、技術過程及創造過程：（5）以都市實質設計的涵構探討都市的實質、自然及人文設計，並藉以討論土地使用、開放空間、建築形式與量體、流通動線、停車場、街道家具及支持活動等；（6）以都市設計的技術探討主要計畫、細部計畫、都市計畫通盤檢討、都市更新、土地使用分區管制及都市景觀管制等技術性課題

description.zh: 「學校」（本課程特指『小學』）並非一單純的設施名稱，而是包含了老師與兒童、學生等人的群體、教育制度－特別是指與學習及教育系統的關聯性、及反映社會與文化背景之整體環境。本課程之內容，初期幾次先說明建築計畫的基本概念及近年來的轉變，以作為理解建築計畫學之基礎。而後進入授課主題，先嘗試從學校的基本知識，即從「教育」、「班級」、「課程」、及「教室」等教育用語之歷史性的考察為起始，了解近代「教育」與「學校」之發展過程。進而以目前國內外教育改革的主要課題－開放教育與開放式學校作為討論的重心。最後以與學校建築相關之各種的研究觀點與方法，及以學習與生活場所為基礎之學校環境論等的論述為總結，期望藉此作為將來學校建築規劃設計之參考。
description.en: It's not a name of facility simply, for a school. Schools are the integral environment where contain the users of teachers and children, education system, and reflecting social and cultural background. The contents of this course that firstly; explain the basic concepts and the transition in recently of Architectural Planning. Secondly, interpret the historical meaning and the transition of radical educational wordings in schools, such as "education", "class", "curriculum", "classroom" etc, in order to understand the processes of development in schooling. Besides, discuss the issues of educational reforms that focus on the open-education and open-school. Lastly, review different approaches to the researches of schools. For the practical planning and design for schools; meanwhile as the conclusion of this course, discussing the theory of school environment base on the point at issue that school is the learning and living places.

name.en: Special Topics on Geographic Information System

description.zh: 本課程重點在訓練學生如何學習使用地理資訊系統的軟硬體設備，作為空間規劃與設計決策支援的工具。內容涵蓋相關理論及實務，範圍包括：一、	地理資訊系統的定義與發展二、	地理資訊系統的架構與功能三、地理資訊系統在空間規劃與設計上之應用四、地理資訊系統相關軟體之操作五、實務應用
description.en: The course designed is to help students to utilize the GIS environments to produce a better decision-making when dealing with space planning and design issues. Both related theories and applications of GIS are introduced.  The content of the course include:1.The definition and development of GIS2.The mainframe and functions of GIS3.The applications on space planning and design of GIS4.The introduction and operation of GIS software5. Applications practice.

name.en: Special Issues of Computer-Aided Architectural Design (II)

description.zh: 本課程主要目標包括以下各方面：1.介紹與瞭解電腦繪圖在環境規劃設計上的應用方法與理論。2.具備將設計作品以數化處理與數位表達的技術與能力。3.學習建築設計三度空間模擬的動畫。4.自動化設計與輔助繪圖思考。授課內容主題包括：建築專業輔助繪圖設計軟體的介紹應用，包括平面繪圖表現，3D模型設計表現，建築專業設計3D動畫模擬處理，自動化繪圖與自動化設計理論介紹，空間資訊系統理論與方法，設計專案的競圖表現與應用。
description.en: The goal of this class:1.We introduce theory of computer-aided architectural design and we apply the method to environmental planning & design.2.We learn how to presentation architectural design by digital method, tools and technology.3.We learn how to simulate architectural design by animation with 3D spatial data model.4.We introduce theory about automatic architectural design and design thinking.The contents of this class is included about: introduction and application of professional soft of computer-aided architectural design, 2D's presentation of computer-aided architectural de

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。（下學期）
description.en: Text,image,audio,video are common used to transmit information now.How to organize and repreaent these different kind of data becames an important issue.This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.zh: 本課程的主要內容是使學習者：具備科學發展史的基本知識；認識科學研究的方法與態度；知道目前科學理論下的宇宙形成、發展、與未來；認知生命科學和物理科學對人類生活互動關係；具備現代人類所應具備的科學素養。
description.en: This course will have some effects for students that learn the basic knowledge of development historic science, and study the methodology and attitude of science research, know the formation, development, and future of universe in science theories at the present day, cognize the interactions of the life science and physics science to human existence, have got the scientific literacy of the be of modern human.

description.zh: 莊子是道家集大成的人物。他的破對待、齊萬物，雖似一異於儒，實則非但與儒相輔相成，且於後來儒說多所啟發。本課程固在使學者能由莊子荒唐之言、無端崖之辭了解莊子，更在使學者能由了解莊子而了解、道會通之處。
description.en: Chuang-tzu is the master figure of Taoism.  His awareness of the relativity of all standards and his belief in the equality of all things look different from Confucianism.  However, in essence, they are complementary to the understanding of Confucianism, and even inspire some of the later Confucianist ideas.  This course intends to focus on Chuang-tzu's absurd remarks and rambling discourses, by which it is hoped that a better understanding of the reciprocity of Taoism and Confucianism can be reached.

description.zh: 介紹台灣地區近五百年以來之開發與變遷，其中歷經西班牙人、荷蘭人、明鄭、滿清以及日本等不同階段之治理，可就政治、經濟、社會、教育及文化等問題分別予以探討，特別是對中華民國政府遷台後之重大建設予以詳細論述，以便對整體台灣歷史之發展得有清晰之認識。
description.en: The course is to introduce the development and evolution of the Taiwan region in the past 500 years. The various stages of the reign by Hollanders, Spaniards, Cheng Ch'eng-kung, Manchurians, and Japanese will be discussed in relation to their politics, economics, social structures, educational systems, and cultural phenomena. The main focus is on the major construction under the reign of the Republic of China.

name.en: The Romance of Three Kingdoms and The Chinese Culture

description.zh: 本課程之設計係針對非歷史系學生研習之用。基本上，以眾所熟知的歷史小說《三國演義》為主軸，來探討中國文化的發展過程中，其在歷史上所扮演角色地位。在文化精神上，它結合了儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的智慧結晶，開創了新時代的思維視野，對映著儒家文化的另股反思力量，擴展了豐富的文化精神，具有著人生啟示作用。準此，來充實學生文化素養，課程方面包括《三國演義》的文化心理結構，倫理觀，儒、墨、道、法、縱橫家的政治思想，與人物形象之塑造等，藉以幫助學生清晰地認識《三國演義》文化精神在中國文化內涵中之特色。再授課方面，以師生共同討論為主，書面報告為輔，期使學生在短時間內認識《三國演義》的時代精神，並對日後生活有所助益。
description.en: This course is designed for non-history majors. It is chiefly intended to interpret the role and significance of the historical fiction The Romance of the Three kingdoms in the development of the Chinese culture.In the spiritual aspect, The Romance of the Three kingdoms demonstrated the intellectual essence of Confucianism, Mohism,Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school of ancient China. It also innovates new visions and new horizons in the traditional Confucian milieu, thus enriching the spirituality of the Chinese culture. The course includes the following topics of The Romance of the Three kingdoms ：the cultural psychological structure, the ethic view, the political views of Confucianism, Mohism, Taoism, the legalist school, and the political strategist school, the characterization, etc. The class activities include lectures and discussions; students are also expected to submit written reports.

description.zh: 法學概論，顧名思義是在介紹法律原理，以啟發學生法學研究的興趣。然而，法學涵蓋的層面甚廣，法學緒論的課程，只能大略介紹各種法律的共通原理，就繁駁的法律現象，作綜合的引說，俾使初學法律的人，不僅能粗知「實定法」的共通原則，還可藉此原則來培養法律見解和修養，執簡馭繁，因而體會法律的性質、內涵和理念。有關本課程的教授方式，擬先介紹法律的基概念及原理，並以答問之方式訓練學生邏輯反思的能力，同時輔以日常屢見之法律實例問題。如此，學生不僅可以可以學習正確的法律觀念和知識，並可培養縝密思辨的能力，將課堂上所習得的知識應用落實在日常生活中，以達保障並維護自己及他人權益之目的。
description.en: Introduction of Law is to introduce the theory of law and to promote students' interest to study law. Since the field of law is very broad but the time is limited, this course can briefly explain common principles of law, complex phenomena of law, etc. The main purpose of this course is to let students catch the concept of common principles of "lex scripta."  Also, this course aims to promote students' knowledge about law, thus cultivating their spirit of abiding by law.  This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of law first. Then students will be given logical training through discussion.  Besides, the general cases and problems of law will be covered as well. Through this course, students can not only get correct concepts of law, but learn to protect their/others' right.

description.zh: 人類為了獲致美好的生活，在物質生活上不斷地努力於自然科學與工藝技術的創造與改進，但在精神的滿足上，雖尚不致於愈來愈貧乏，但如果我們從生活的整體來看，人們似乎並未能真正有效解決他們自己所製造出來的問題。社會科學的研究，即是希望能提供人們對社會及行為科學領域的認識，減少對未來的失望、恐懼；增加對生活的瞭解、憧憬。本課程雖然未能顧及社會及行為的全體，但卻可以讓學習者在最短的時間，掌握到入門的主要課題。
description.en: In order to acquire a better material life, human beings have been working hard on the innovative production and improvement in natural science and technological skills. On the other hand, though people do not suffer from a worse mental satisfaction than before, they have not discovered a way to effectively solve the problems made by themselves, as is viewed from the entire picture of life. The study of social science presents such a good way that the average people would know more about both social and behavioral science, help reduce the fear of future disappointment and, what is important, add to the knowledge and beautiful image of life. This course, though not able to cover all the topics of social and behavioral science, attempts to help students have a good command of major topics in the shortest period of time.

description.zh: 一、教學目標：幫助同學把毛筆字練好，進而培養欣賞能力。二、其教學內容包含1.鑑賞相關知識。2.名碑帖之認識3.篆刻、裱褙    之簡介4.行書、楷書之臨模與創作5.書論之研讀。三、評量則以整學期先後習作之比較出情訂定其成績。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to improve students' ability of appreciating Chinese calligraphy as well as the practice of handwriting skill. The contents include: 1. The knowledge of appreciation 2. Introduction of masterpieces. 3. Introductory studies of seal carving and traditional Chinese picture mounting. 4. Chinese calligraphy practice 5.reference materials study. Grading will be based on the improvement of students` works through all semester.

description.zh: 本課程將有系統的介紹世界上最新的光電科技發展及在台灣的相關光電產業。時間上規劃以第一小時介紹基本光電理論，第二小時介紹應用技術與實例。課程內容包括：1.雷射光與原理與應用， 2.雷射光與精密量測， 3.雷射光與機械人， 4.光電技術與半導體製造， 5.光資訊與光儲存， 6.光纖通訊系統， 7.紅外系統， 8.紫外線系統， 9. 雷射醫學應用， 10雷射光與國防， 11.光學設計與光學設計軟體， 12 光電科技與未來。
description.en: The course gives the outlook of the technology of Opto-electronics and the industry of Opto-electronics in Taiwan. The contents of this course are constructed as following：1. The principles and applications of Laser, 2. Laser and precise measurements, 3. Laser and robot, 4. Opto-electronics technology and semiconductor magnification, 5. Optical information and Optical storage 6. Optical fiber communication, 7. Infrared system, 8. Ultraviolet system, 9. Medical applications of laser, 10. Laser and defense 11. Optical design and software. 12. Opto-electronics and future.

description.zh: 本課程係為日語入門課程。課程架構由五十音發音的學習開始、定良好的發音基礎。進一步再以句型為骨幹、將日語基本文法融合句型中、並透過日常場面會話的反復問答練習、期望培養會說、會用的簡單會話能力及聽力。予定課程學習目標：名詞、動詞的肯定、否定及時式表現、地點、移動基本句型。
description.en: This is a beginner's lesson for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. We wish our students first start with good basic pronunciation, and secondary we will put the basic word pattern as a main framework and combine elementary grammar into the pattern. Then through a repeated practice of daily life conversation, hopefully our students can achieve of using simple Japanese conversation with basic speaking and listen comprehension. Estimated learning targets: Nouns, adjectives, positive and negative of verbs, tense and moving status sentences etc.----basic Japanese word pattern.

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1.提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2.激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3.介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4.建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1.概論, 2.歌樂, 3.器樂, 4.儀式音樂, 5.舞蹈音樂, 6.戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 民主政治為法治政治，凡政府各項施政均需有法令依據。行政法，乃是國家各行政機關所適用之各種法令規章之總稱，其內容含蓋國家行政機關之組織、職權、作用、程序及爭訟等事項之法規，範圍至為廣泛，且與人民之權利、義務息息相關。本課程將以系統化、生動化，並輔以實例之方式講授，以啟發同學學習興趣。同學修習本課程，除可增進法治知能與素養外，並可對日常生活之權益維護有重大裨益。
description.en: Democracy is regarded as rule by law nowadays. All official policies that are implemented by government must be based on law. Administrative law is a general term of all kinds of regulations and laws that are suitable for administrative organizations. The content includes of administrative organization in this country. The course serves as extensive rules that are related to people is rights and obligations. The principle emphasis of the course is on the systematic instruction with specific examples tc enlighten students learning interest, furthermore not only promoting knowledge and professional training in law but also effective in daily life.

description.zh: (一)認識地球與地球科學  1.認識地球的重要性--經驗的與科學的角度2.地球科學家與地球知識3.地球知識的探究範圍--地球的結構(二)地球與星系的有機係4.宇宙的形成與大爆炸5.地球與銀河系6.地球的動力系統--內動力與外動力(三)岩石圈與人類棲居的範圍7.地球的內動力系統與地殼變動8.岩石圈的形成與特徵:從地質到地形9.岩石圈、陸地與人類活動的關係(四)水圈、大氣圈與自然環境皂動力10.水、空氣與土地的互動11.水循環與外動力系統(陽光)12.大氣運動與天氣變化(五)認識地球的本質13.地球作為人類的家14.節制與維護:人與自煞的和諧交往。
description.en: 1.Knowing the Earth and the science of Earth(1)The importance of knowing earth--its experiential and scientific role(2)Scientists of Earth and the knowlege of earth.(3)The  structure of earth.2.The organic relation between earth and galaxy (4)The formation of universe and Big-Bang.(5)The earth and Milky Way Galaxy.(6)The dynamic system of the earth.3.The lithosphere and the horizen of human habitat(7)The inner dynamic system of the earth and the crust change.(8)The formation and characteristic of the lithosphere:from geology to geomorphology.(9)The relation of the lithosphere,continental plate, and human activities.4.The hydrosphere,the atmosphere and the dynamic of the physical environment.(10)The interaction between water, air and land.(11)The hydrologic cycle and the outer dynamic system.(12)The air movement and the weather change.5.Knowing the nature of earth.(13)The earth as a living place for mankind.(14)Restriction and maintance: the harmonious relations between men and nature.

description.zh: 從日語的50音、日常問候用語及自我介紹等開始學起，循序漸進學會日語會話基本語彙、句型及用法等，課程中介紹日本生活習慣、日本文化與年中行事，並採用CD等視聽輔助教材，進行聽力訓練、會話練習及日本歌謠及演歌教唱等。
description.en: This is a beginner's course for Japanese language study. The curriculum structure starts from 50 basic Japanese pronouncing letters. The aims of the courses are to increase students' ability to use the Japanese language for academic, business, and social purposes. In addition, students are introduced to relevant aspects of Japan's life and culture and prepared for work in the specific subject fields.

description.zh: 數學與物理是學習理工科目必備的工具，然而很多同學卻視為畏途。探究其原因，是抽象的思維方式以及部分不合實用的作法，造成學習上的障礙。本課程希望藉由電腦的輔助，將數學、物理與工程數學上幾個重要的觀念具體化，使學生能對抽象觀念有直覺式的體驗，結合理論與實際，進一步提升分析問題的能力。
description.en: Mathematics and Physics are prerequisites for learning science and engineering; nevertheless, many students are afraid to study them. Investigating into the problem, we find that the way of abstract and some impractical methods hinder them from learning those subjects. In this course we will study some major concepts including Mathematics, Physics and Engineering Mathematics etc. and combine the theorems and the realities by the aid of computers to promote our students the capability of analyzing.

description.zh: 古蹟是人類歷史發展過程中所留下來的具體構造物，它是歷史的見證，也是文化的軌跡。在台灣發展史上從早期的原住民社會到漢人移民大量進入台灣，及十七世紀後歷經不同政權的統治，每個時期均留下不少的古蹟，這些古蹟是文化發展的具體證據，是了解台灣歷史與文化的最佳途徑，而透過古蹟的探索可進一步增進傳統的建築、藝術、民俗、文物等各方面的知識，使學生從中體會先民來台的艱辛與其生活的智慧，培育其珍視先民文物史蹟的情懷。
description.en: Historical sites are the concrete structures, left behind by the historical development of human beings. They are genuine witnesses of history and the cultural tracks as well. In the history of Taiwan, quite a few historical sites built in different phases remain existent: from the early aboriginal society via the big migration of the Hans to the various periods of sovereignty since 17th century. The sites turn out to be important evidence of cultural growth, the easiest access to the understanding of Taiwanese history and culture. A thorough explore into the historical sites helps a lot to broaden our knowledge in the conventional architectures, arts, folklore and cultural objects. This course also helps us to realize the hardships of life our forefathers encounter and the wisdom they acquire, in the hope to grow a better sense to treasure the past culture and the objects available to them.

description.zh: 台灣經濟的發展已帶動了政治民主化的發展，尤其自解嚴後，政治社會全面變遷，改變幅度之大與範圍之廣，變化之快速與轉變之激烈，予人一種眼花撩亂，目不暇給之感。身為明日舞台的主人，要不被社會拖著走，唯有洞察、掌握社會變遷脈動的能力。本課程將以學術理論為你深入分析、客觀探討。
description.en: The economic development in Taiwan resulted in the rapid development in political spheres. Especially after the lifting of the martial law, the changes in politics and society have exerted a great impact.  This course will provide students with the ability to keep track of the changes of the society.  Based on political theories, students will learn how to investigate the phenomena and analyze the reasons of these changes.

description.zh: 面對科技發展日新月異，社會急驟變遷的新世紀，只習得專業上的一技之長，已不足以和協圓滿地實踐有意義的人生。有鑑於此，乃以生涯發展與生涯諮商的理論與研究為基礎，配合學生的發展，希翼能透過教育的歷程，使學生的專業知識能和未來的工作與生活規劃，產生有意義的聯結，進而為學生提供一個短程與長程的生涯發展與選擇的準備與指引。授課內容包括生涯理念介紹、興趣、性格、價值觀探索，生涯決定因素，生涯技巧，生涯角色調適，生涯選擇與規劃技巧，生涯訪談，生涯高原調適，轉型期調適，性別、職業歧視，雙生涯家庭，就業準備等主要生涯課題的研討與習作。
description.en: In face of a new century with continuous scientific development and rapid social changes, to learn one single professional skill is not enough to fulfill a meaningful life in a harmonic and satisfactory manner. In view of this, based on the theory and research of career development and consultation in association with the development of students,  it is hoped to produce a meaningful linking between their professional knowledge and job and life planning through the course of eucation, and further to provide them a preparation and guide for short and long-range career development and choice. The contents of the course include the discussion and exercise related to major career topics such as introduction to the concept of career, the discussion of interest, character and value, decisive factors of career, skills of career, role adjustment in career, career choice and planning skill, career interview, uphill adjustment in career, adjustment in transit period, sex and occupation.

description.zh: 人的身體一接觸自然界，便開始各個器官的功能，人不如機器，無法汰換零件，加上身體機能遇到問題之後，許多人往往不知如何處理應對，甚至身體出現徵兆也渾然不知。所以此科目最主要的目的是希望藉由對醫學的認識，讓大學生們更瞭解自己的身體，進而保護並時時自我偵測身體是否正常運作，要培養健全的大學生，而不是只會讀書的大病貓。
description.en: Once the human body contacts the natural environment, the organs of the body begin to function.  But the human body can not change it's organizational like machine.  So when our body's function is in trouble, we always have no idea how to solve it, either to find out.  One of these course's objection is to let college students understanding their own body by learning some important medical concepts.  We hope that our country both has excellent and healthy college students,  and not all sick.

description.zh: 本課程將包含土石坎的自由振動及強制振動的力學行為,土石坎振動的速度及加速度頻譜,土石坎受振動的數值分析模擬,土石坎的監測及安全評估.
description.en: This course will cover free vibration and forced vibration of earth embankment, velocity and acceleration spectra,monitoring system and safety evaluation.

description.zh: 本課程專為主修非生命科學領域的大專學生所設計，透過日常生活常見的現象，介紹生物學幾個主要學門領域的概念，使學習者能夠瞭解生物學知識在生活中的應用。課程以講解、簡易實驗操作、討論和分組報告進行，包括：細胞學、生物技術、人體構造功能、植物構造與功能、生態學。課程的重點在於生物相關訊息的蒐集、理解、資料整理、判讀，希望能夠建立學生接觸非主修領域知識的習慣，有更廣泛和自由的思維。
description.en: This course is designed for non life science major students. Through events usually occur in everyday life, we will explore the relationship between Biology and our daily life. The goal of the course is to create an environment which lets students contact with the field with which they are unfamiliar, and to understand it with interest. Course activities include : lectures, group discussion, simple experiments. The important topics of the course include : cell, biotechnology, human health, horticulture.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為：充實生活技能、提升科技素養、豐富生活內涵、培養繼續進修之興趣與能力，以奠定終身學習及生涯發展之基礎。本課程之內容為：一、電腦基本概念，二、電腦功能與應用，三、資料處理，四、資訊管理，五、資訊網路，六、電腦的聲光世界，七、電腦的安全問題與防治，八、未來的資訊社會。
description.en: This course is designed to help student to learn another skill, better understand technology, enrich there live and inspire their interests for further study. The course includes: 1.basic knowledge of computer; 2.the application of computer; 3.data procession; 4.data control; 5.internet; 6.multimedia; 7.computer virus; 8. the world of information.

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 藥膳在中醫理論指導下，將中草藥與實務相配合，運用傳統烹調技術和現代加工方法製成味、色、形俱佳的、更有保健和治療作用作之食品，其內容廣泛，迄今已有三千年之歷史。所謂藥食同源更是集中而深刻的體現了藥膳之重要性。本課程共分：湯膳概論、穀物湯膳、蔬菜湯膳、果品湯膳、畜肉湯膳、海鮮湯膳、藥草湯膳和美容養生湯膳等。
description.en: The Applied Nutrition of Life is two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various food cooking of Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include some Chinese food cooking contain Chinese herbal and some skill to how to select a good quality Chinese herbal.

name.en: An exploration of the place-names in Taiwan

description.zh: 「台灣」的名稱很可能是由「埋冤」或「埋完」的閩南語演變而來的（台灣的「灣」，本地人均唸第二聲，音如「完」或近「冤」，而不唸原字該唸的第一聲）。早期在台灣幾乎到處可見的「御使崎」地名，其實是緣自當時最普遍的運輸工具「牛車」而來的特殊景觀。  「地名」通常可顯示出當地地形、地物或地貌景觀的特徵。也可能代表了當地特殊的地理現象，更可能隱藏著台灣先民許多胼手胝足、可歌可泣的傳奇和拓荒血淚史。而幾個地名串連起來，也許就訴說了一條我們祖先從閩粵來台，由登陸、轉進、開發以至於定居的路線。  一個地方怎麼會以虐待動物的「打狗」、「打貓」為名？「貴子坑」為何有好多「鬼」故事？基隆為什麼原稱「雞籠」呢？沙鹿、初鹿、鹿草、鹿野、鹿谷、鹿港……等，這麼多地方以「鹿」為名，究竟那裡有鹿？那裡沒有鹿？如果沒有鹿，怎麼會以「鹿」為名呢？南投在南、北投在北，當然是天經地義的事，可是北港在南，南港卻在北，如何令人心服口服呢？台北、台南、台中、台東都有，為什麼獨缺「台西」縣市呢？  總之，台灣地名的來由，真是琳琅滿目、數之不盡，有知識性的，也有趣味性的；有文獻記載的，也有口耳相傳的，請讓我快快道來……。
description.en: The place-names in Taiwan not only tell us the forms of the land, and the superficies of the ground, but also reveals the special geographical phenomena, and much further, the hardship and legendary of our ancestors.The name "Taiwan" could be evolved from the slang - "bury the grievance" or "bury it all" in Taiwanese.  Some places have merciless names such as "thrash the dog", "thrash the cat".  What is the reason that Keelung was ever called "chicken cage"?  We can find many places were named with "deer" in Taiwan, but we cannot see any deer in some of these places today.  I believe that it will be very difficult to convince our people that BeiGang (north port) is in the South and NanGang (south port) is in the North！Altogether, the stories of the place-names in Taiwan are countless and in variety, some of them are knowledgeable, and some are amusing; there are also some from the literature, and some are from legend. The main idea of this course is to help us looking into how various

name.en: Research in the Society of Education

description.zh: 縱覽教育社會學理論基礎，研習教育社會研究方法論，主題探討包含:技職教育與社會發展及社會心理學，重要論點在於如何透過教育社會學觀點，針對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: Overview of theories and research methodology in the society of education. Topics include collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, social psychology and analysis of conclusion or implications underlying from major research in the society of education to solve current issues of the technical-vocational education.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。視覺檢測的基本原理、視覺系統原理各元件之作用原理、規格、限制等、影像處理技術（包括影像轉換、影像復原、影像強化、影像分割）、非接觸性尺寸量測、模式辨認（自動邊境偵測：表面積、孔數、週長及重心、方向特徵等）、影像壓縮與傳送、電腦的影像傳送、個案研究。
description.en: Basic Principle of Vision Inspection, Hardware Components of Vision System, Image Processing (Image Transform, Image Restoration, Image Enhancement, Image Segmentation), Non-Contact Dimension Measurement, Pattern Recognition (Automatic Edge Detection: Surface Area, Number of Holes, Perimeter, Centroid, Directional characteristic etc.) Image Compression and Transmission, and Case Study.

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 工業工程為提高生產力，減低成本，改善品質的重耍科學，其應用範圍不限工商業，其理念可廣泛地使用於各行各業，基本上，工業工程與管理是關於人力、物力，設備的整合系統設計、改良與裝置的一門科學，它運用數學、自然科學與社會科學的智識與技巧，並應用工程分析、原理與方法，做工業工程事務上的規定、預測與評核，其重要內容包括如下：1.工程經濟工業組織與管理、工業行銷，2.生產計劃與管制、工廠製造與流程、物料之管理，3.方法研究、工業安全、品管、作業研究等等。
description.en: 1. Industrial organization and management 2. Industrial marketing 3. Production planning and control 4. Factory manufacturing and flow 5. Resource management 6. Industrial security 7. Quality control 8. Operations research

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料科學與工程緒論、原子結構與鏈結、結晶構造與幾何結晶學、凝固、結晶缺陷與固體中的擴散、金屬材料之機械性質、聚合材料、相圖、工程合金、陶瓷材料、複合材料、腐蝕、材料的電性質、光性質與超導材料、磁性材料。
description.en: Introduction to Material Science and Engineering, Atomic Structure and Bonding, Crystal Structures and Crystal Geometry, Solidification, Crystal Imperfections and Diffusion in Solids, Mechanical Properties of Metals, Ploymeric Materials, Phase diagram, Engineering Alloys, Ceramic Materials, Composite Materials, Corrosion, Electrical Properties of materials, Optical properties and Superconducting Materials, and Magnetic Materials.

description.zh: 本課程內容在於了解國際品質標準及台灣紡織工業之因應1.國際標準化2.ISO9000品質管理系統3. ISO14000環境管理系統4.符合之審查5.驗證機構與品質稽核6.如何獲得驗證7.國內紡織業之事例研究
description.en: In the time of increasing global competition it is essential for companies to have products or services of a high quality. Recognition that the quality management system is of an internationally recognized standard is a great aid in global market. Consequently, Taiwanese textile corporations have increasingly sought ISO 9000 and ISO 14000 certification. Therefore, .the course covers:  1.Global standardization2.ISO 9000 series quality management systems standards3.ISO 14000 environmental management systems standards4.Conformity assessment 5.Certification body and quality auditing6.How to seek certification7.Successful certification: The case studies

description.zh: 本課程討論液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括1.液晶之來由及其分類2.液晶之電場與磁場效應3.液晶之光學性質4.液晶顯示器（STN LCD,TFT LCD）及其他應用5.液向型液晶及其在生物體與日常生活體品之應用6.高分子液晶與高強度纖維
description.en: The course is an introduction to Liquid Crystal Materials. Including 1.What are Liquid Crystal? 2.The story of Liquid Crystal；3.Electric and Magnetic Field Effects；4.Light and Nematic Liquid Crystal；5. Liquid Crystal Displays(STN-LCD, TFT-LCD) and other applications；6.Lyotropic Liquid Crystal；7.Polymer Liquid Crystals.

description.zh: 透過幻燈片或實物，評鑑設計作品之優劣，從美學、材料利用、及加工技術上著眼；並從設計的觀點去品味物體型態之美以及辨別初用心在設計上的多方面價值,同時也讓同學發表自己的看法，與教師討論。
description.en: The introduction of Art to cultivate the sense and conception of Aesthetics and raise the judgment of beautiful objects.  The purpose is to apply this course to product design.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意聲學之性質，噪音對人類之影響，音源及音場，噪音量測及分析設備，聲音之量測，噪音位準、標準及規範，音響材料及結構，噪音控制之原理。
description.en: The Nature of Sound, Effects of Noise on People, Sound Source and Sound Fields, Instrumentation for Measurement and Analysis of Noise, Acoustical Measurements, Noise Criteria, Standards and Regulations, Acoustical Materials and Structures, Principles of Noise Control.

description.zh: 此課程在介紹 Optimal Control 的理論基礎與其應用﹐範圍從古典的早期發展到最新的進展都包括在內，其目的在使同學能具有最佳控制器設計能力。 內容包括: 最佳化問題求解、線性二次調整器設計、線性二次高斯觀測器設計。此外，現代控制中常用的loop shaping及loop transfer recovery技術亦將在課程中介紹。預修課程 ： 線性控制系統(可同時修)、工程數學
description.en: 1.	Introduction.2.	Mathematical preliminaries for optimal control.3.	Classical linear quadratic optimal control, including regulation & tracking control.4.	Observer based optimal control (LQG control). 5.	Loop shaping and LTR control.  This is a course designed for graduate students which will provide techniques that can help you to design an optimal controller for linear systems with a specific performance index. Concepts such as optimality condition, linear quadratic regulation (LQR), and linear quadratic gaussian (LQG) problem are introduced in the course. In addition, the course also includes the loop shaping concept and the loop transfer recovery (LTR) technique which are frequently used in the modern control.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討土木工程施工品質的內容，並藉由諸如統計品管，QC七大手法，ISO9000等品管技能與精義，探討改進工程品質，防止土木災害的相關技術。
description.en: This course will discuss the construction quality of civil engineering in detail.Form the learning of statistical quality,QC seven tools and ISO 9000,students can understand how to improve the quality and prevent the accident of civil engineering.

description.zh: 基本熱傳機構，穩態與非穩態熱傳導其包括有內部熱源之系統。內部及外部之強制及自然對流。表面及氣體間之輻射。利用因次方法及邊界層來考量熱傳。
description.en: Basic heat transfers mechanisms. Steady and unsteady conduction, including system with internal heat sources. Internal and external forced and free convection. Radiation between surfaces and in gases. Dimensional and boundary layer consideration.
